Imp’s Adventure Simulator will allow you to simulate the dice rolls to estimate your chances of achieving the different rewards.

You must enter the number of normal dices you are planning to use, your amount of lucky dice, and your current position in the game (square number, from 1-20, 0 is starting position). The app will perform thousands of simulations to predict your expected results.
Based in the results provided you will be able to decide with more precision how much dices to buy with gems or money.
The level of the Mushroom Hut must be between 1 and 3
When you have only one Lucky Dice it will be used to get another one in the next round
Not use the lucky die to get another lucky die when you are in box 19.
Use the lucky dice (with the number 5) if you have a Lucky Card active to get another lucky die and advance 10 squares.
Use the extra lucky die to get out of the Karma house.
No luck in 19: Not use the lucky die to get another lucky die when you are in box 19.
Optimize lucky card: Use the lucky dice (with the number 5) if you have a Lucky Card active to get another lucky die and advance 10 squares.
Save from Karma: Use the extra lucky die to get out of the Karma house.
All active strategies can be enabled or disabled in the settings.
When you only have one dice left and you are one or two stars away from getting the next reward, it will save it to assure the two stars from it.
When you don\'t have more normal dice and you still have lucky dice, they will try to optimize to obtain more dice. If not possible, number 6 will be used.

Imp’s Adventure Simulator is a simulator for the Imp’s Adventure event in Idle Heroes game. Its objective is to calculate as accurately as possible what are the possibilities of obtaining the different rewards offered from the parameters provided by you.
Square number on the board where your Imp is currently located.
Number of stars you have earned so far.
Number of normal dice you plan to use.
Amount of lucky dice you have.
Current level of square number 4, where the first Mushroom Hut is.
Current level of square number 11, where the second Mushroom Hut is.
Current level of square number 18, where the third Mushroom Hut is.

Lucky Dices Optimization: This option applies the following strategy: When you have a single lucky dice, this dice will only be used to fall back into Lucky Hut (square number 20) and thus obtain a new lucky dice. This guarantees that every turn on the board you will have at least one "extra" roll.
In Settings you can specify the number of simulations you want to perform. Keep in mind that the more simulations the more demanding it will be for your mobile phone.
